name: darwin
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the capital city of the Northern Territory in Australia: She was found one night wandering the streets of suburban Darwin in northern Australia. Darwin now hopes to transform itself from a tropical backwater to one of Australia's most dynamic regions.
More examplesFewer examplesThe line from Adelaide to Alice Springs was extended across Australia to Darwin in 2004.The climax of the story is based on the real-life bombing of Darwin by Japanese forces in 1942.Last night the first 45 victims arrived in the northern port city of Darwin. Darwin is the ideal gateway to the Northern Territory.
